name: Jump! (TheoCoombesGames)
description:
Welcome to Jump!

Jump! is a game about jumping from randomly generated place to place. Each platform has its own random size and position. The aim of the game is to beat your personal record and go as far as you can without falling off any platform.

Have Fun!

Theo

P.S. It would be great if you could give feedback/game ideas as I am a new developer.
